channel.title: Help adding a command please help
channel.description:
i have a command maker that makes the command but i dont know where to put it in the client.java if anyone could take a picture of where i put it i will be happy
and some simple instructions thx :D[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 06, 2008, 06:03:07 PM[/size][hr]i rly need some help with pictures thx :D

item.title: Help adding a command please help
item.dc:creator: @Sinior_Jube_Head Sinior Jube Head
item.description:
@Sinior_Jube_Head wrote:

Easily explained:

  1. open client.java…

  2. hit ‘ctrl + f’

  3. type in the search bar, command.eq

  4. under the thing that comes up, after the last ’ } ’ that comes before the command after it, put YOUR command.

  5. C Ya, hope i helped.

[center]~Sinior Jube Head[/center]

Read full topic
item.source: Help adding a command please help

item.title: Help adding a command please help
item.dc:creator: @pwner943 pwner943
item.description:
@pwner943 wrote:

search in ur client.java for if (command
then after the last { of a command
hit enter 2 times then put it there

item.title: Help adding a command please help
item.dc:creator: @Rayne Rayne
item.description:
@Rayne wrote:

search in your client.java a commonly used command like yell. Then find the last command and add it under there.
